text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this article, the Department may develop and implement an electronic system for the sale and issuance of licenses, permits, and registrations and the recording and releasing of security interests.

The electronic system may include provisions for:
Recording titling and registration data;
Recording and releasing liens without the issuance of a security interest filing; and
Recording information relating to an application for a license, permit, or registration.
The Department shall develop the electronic system consistent with the statewide information technology master plan developed under Title 3A, Subtitle 3 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.

The Department may adopt regulations to:
Implement the electronic system authorized under this section; and
Determine the appropriate fee levels that may be charged by a vendor and by the Department for the electronic transmission service.
